name: Mystic
description: Masters of thought, will, and the unseen threads that bind reality.

features.name: Arcane Initiate
features.description: You gain a Spellcrafting Book containing six Rank 1 Novice spells, an arcane focus, and basic training in shaping energy.

features.name: Spell Attunement
features.description: Your Spell Attack modifier equals your Intellect modifier. Your Spell Save TN equals 8 + your Intellect modifier.

features.name: Flow of Thought
features.description: Once per short rest, as a Bonus Action, gain advantage on Intellect saving throws until the start of your next turn.
